description: School level as Primary, Prekindergarten, Ungraded,  Elementary, Middle,  Secondary, High, or Other
Possible Values: Primary, Prekindergarten, Ungraded,  Elementary, Middle,  Secondary, High, or Other

description: School type as Regular school, Special education school,  Vocational school, or Other/alternative school
Possible Values: Regular school, Special education school,  Vocational school, or Other/alternative school

description: Yes or No for Charter status
Share of students scoring proficient on a mathematics assessment
Number of students eligible for free lunch as a count
A statistical estimate of the percentage of a school's students living in poverty. This estimate is the preferred statistic for national-level analyses.
source: Model Estimates of Poverty in Schools (MEPS)

description: The statistical estimate of the percentage of a school's students living in poverty, modified to align with a measure of the school district's poverty. This estimate is the preferred statistic for analysis of large school districts across time or across states.
source: Model Estimates of Poverty in Schools (MEPS)

Possible Values: School is eligible for Title I Schoolwide program (SWP) and provides Title I Schoolwide program or School is not eligible for either Title I Targeted Assistance or Schoolwide program
